Of this county on a Great Lake

Of this winey county west of Napa

Of this charm county, we guess

Of this county named for Revolutionary general Francis

Tucson: 
Of this county/people/type of cotton

Yes, they still make this brand of shoes & the basset hound is still the logo

clues.clue: (Mandy Patinkin presents the clue.) I was a big fan of the late Stephen Sondheim & I am honored to have originated the role of the artist Seurat in this James Lapine-Sondheim musical that was inspired by a painting

final_jeopardy.clue: To fight malaria, this former royal estate helped move quinine-producing cinchona plants from South America to India
